entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.1°C

Humidity: 83 %

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
